verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%>: I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2198>livest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

Be <S%G1096><s%> thou <S%G1127>watchful<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4741>establish<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3062>remain<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> were <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2147>have<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of thine <S%G4137>perfected<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> thou hast <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G191>hear<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G2532>it<s%>, and <S%G3340>repent<s%>. <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> thou <S%G1127>shalt<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%>, I will come2240, Esther9, 4571 <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt not3756, 3361 <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> I will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

But thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> names3686, 2532 <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3435>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3435>defile<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5359>Philadelphia<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%>: These <S%G3592>things<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he that is <S%G40>holy<s%>, he that is <S%G228>true<s%>, he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, he that <S%G455>openeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> shall <S%G2808>shut<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G2808>shutteth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G455>openeth<s%>:

I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2400>(behold<s%>, I have <S%G1325>set<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%>, <S%G2532>which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2808>shut<s%>), <S%G846><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>didst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> thou didst <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>, I <S%G2504>also<s%> will <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3986>trial<s%>, that hour <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2064>is<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%>, to <S%G3985>try<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

<S%G2400><s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>: <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%>.

He <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3528>overcometh<s%>, I will <S%G4160>make<s%> him a <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> thence no3756, 3361 <S%G2089>more<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> cometh <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> own <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G5513>lukewarm<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2200>hot<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5593>cold<s%>, I <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G1692>spew<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G3004>sayest<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have gotten <S%G4147>riches<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G3762>nothing<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>knowest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5005>wretched<s%> one <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1652>miserable<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>naked<s%>:
